name: Blow Kings
description:
Do you want to eat bugs, balls, stool, durian...? No, of course not! So try your best to defeat every opponent!
The blow battle is on the verge of, it's time to tell the world who are the real blow kings!

Game features:
1. Simple but addictive mechanism
According to the proportion of air inhaled in the lungs, find the right time to launch a blow attack and defeat the opponent in the shortest time!

2. Unlock new opponents
With so many interesting new characters challenging you, who will be the loser?

3. Special levels
In the process of blowing, you will meet various funny opponents and perform different special missions. For example, you need to blow up a man’s wig... and more special missions are waiting for you to discover......

4. Increased blowing power
You need to constantly upgrade your blowing power to ensure victory in more matches later!

5. Relax and have fun
This is a super fun casual game, just show them who has the real blowing ability.

You will love it! Enjoy!!!
